thumb.name: For Wonderful Parents
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas%3Cbr%3Eto Mom and Dad%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor being such%3Cbr%3Ewonderful parents.%3Cbr%3Efor making our home%3Cbr%3Ea special place to grow up in.%3Cbr%3Eand for doing everything%3Cbr%3Ewith hearts full%3Cbr%3Eof caring and love...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThank you.%3Cbr%3EMom and Dad.%3Cbr%3EYou're two%3Cbr%3Every special people.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Love%3Cbr%3Efrom Eric

thumb.name: Long Distance Family
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Linda.%3Cbr%3EBecause%3Cbr%3Ethe Family%3Cbr%3ECan't%3Cbr%3EBe All%3Cbr%3ETogether%3Cbr%3EThis%3Cbr%3EChristmas%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThough the miles%3Cbr%3Emay keep us apart%3Cbr%3Ethis holiday season.%3Cbr%3Ethe special family ties we share%3Cbr%3Ewill always keep us close.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope You%3Cbr%3EHave a Good Christmas!

thumb.name: Deeper %26 Deeper
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EDonna. at Christmastime. I'm looking back on all the little things that made me fall in love with you. I remember the way your smile could melt my heart. and how easily I could lose myself in a kiss or find myself in your touch%26#133;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EI remember all the little things that made me fall in love with you then. because they're the same things that keep me falling deeper and deeper in love with you now%26#133;Merry Christmas to the one I love more and more each day.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Grandma %26 Grandpa Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ELoving Christmas Greetings%3Cbr%3Eto Grandma and Grandpa%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFrom All of Us%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHearts that care remember.%3Cbr%3Eand this season's%3Cbr%3E set apart %3Cbr%3ETo remind you%3Cbr%3Ethat you're close in thought%3Cbr%3Eand always close in heart.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMerry Christmas
